question: Which of the following is an advantage of using biomass in the form of corn to produce ethanol? W) Using corn to produce ethanol means that the U.S. will no longer need to import petroleum- based products X) Corn-based ethanol is more fuel efficient than gasoline Y) Corn-based ethanol production has little impact on water supply Z) Food for cattle is produced when corn grain is converted to ethanol
answer:
Z) FOOD FOR CATTLE IS PRODUCED WHEN CORN GRAIN IS CONVERTED TO
ETHANOL
